Byzantine-Robust Aggregation

Implementation of Krum, Multi-Krum, Trimmed Mean, and Bulyan defenses against Byzantine attacks.

Overview

Implementation of Krum, Multi-Krum, Trimmed Mean, and Bulyan defenses against Byzantine attacks.
